content:
I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to explore new techniques and materials for your next piece! Incorporating found ocean objects into your sculpture can add a whole new level of depth and meaning to your work. It's a great way to connect with the ocean and its beauty, and to tell a story through your art.

Remember, the key to incorporating found objects into your sculpture is to experiment and play with different techniques and materials until you find what works best for you. Don't be afraid to try new things and take risks – it's all part of the creative process!

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. And don't forget to have fun and enjoy the process of creating – it's just as important as the final product!

Good luck with your next sculpture, and I hope it turns out amazing!
